overview: Viennese vegetable merchant Karl Kassbach becomes a member of a right-wing extremist organization, which plans numerous attacks on democratic institutions and journalists. The film attempts to portray a realistic and detail-oriented study of the mind of the "Kleinb√ºrger", trapped between the fringes of the lower and middle-classes.
tagline: Kassbach is no monster, he is terribly normal.
title: Kassbach - Ein Portrait
